english.segment1: Is it greed or ignorance or is it both?. as the bulldozer trashes a thousand years growth. clearcutting with a clear conscience-a burning desire to burn. if a tree falls and no ones around-the wildlife still hear it crashing down
english.segment2: You were gone before we even knew you. and there's no way to ever get you back
english.segment3: Gorilla seven days old ripped from his dead mother's arms. her hand-now an ashtray-souvenir for a tourist's charms
english.segment4: Will I join the ranks of the photo gallery?. It may be the only way left to ever see me
english.segment5: Thousand acres a day. burning it all away. extinction the price to pay
english.segment6: A ton of rhino, a pound of horn. the Javan one cursed-the wheels of greed are born. medicinal myth, smuggled to Hong Kong. ancient superstition-reality gone wrong
english.segment7: I joined the ranks of the photo gallery. it's the only way left to ever see me. You were gone before we even knew you. and there's no way to ever get you back
english.segment8: The greatest land animal killed for a foot of ivory. will your children live to see one-or witness decimation by tyranny
english.segment9: Passenger pigeons blackened the sky. never a chance we would say goodbye. oh how I wish I could see one fly
english.segment10: You were gone before we even knew you. and there's no way to ever get you back
english.segment11: American symbol of freedom and power. only for target practice by the hour. buffalo sat on the brink of no more
